```{r echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', comment = NA}
library(rmarkdown)

get.content <- function(my.meta){
  my.out = ""
  my.title <- paste(c("<h3>", my.meta$title, "</h3>"), collapse = "")
  my.date <- paste(c("<h4>", my.meta$date, "</h4>"), collapse = "")
  my.link <- paste(c(" <a class='intext-link' href='", my.meta$url, "'>Read more</a>."), collapse = "")
  my.line <- paste(c("<p>", my.meta$summary, my.link, "</p>"), collapse="")

  my.out <- paste(c(my.title, my.date, my.line), collapse="\n")
  return(my.out)
}

post.path <- "."
my.files <- list.files(path = post.path, pattern = "^2020.*Rmd$")
my.files <- sort(my.files, decreasing = TRUE)
for (f in my.files){
    f.path <- file.path(post.path, f)
    f.meta <- rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(f.path)
    f.out <- get.content(f.meta)
    writeLines(f.out)
}
```
